params.isBeacon_: boolean, if true the instance will be BeaconProxy or TransparentProxy.
params.params_: contains all data needed to create an instance of ArrakisV2 vault.

returns.vault: the address of the Arrakis V2 vault instance created.

returns._0: admin address of Arrakis V2 instance admin.
implementation address of Arrakis V2 implementation.
name name of the arrakis V2 vault.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

returns._0: vaults list of all created vaults.

devdoc.title: ArrakisV2Factory factory for creating vault instances.

deployVault((uint24[],address,address,ad.notice: Deploys an instance of Vault using BeaconProxy or TransparentProxy.

getTokenName(address,address).notice: get Arrakis V2 standard token name for two corresponding tokens.

numVaults().notice: numVaults counts the total number of vaults in existence

upgradeVaults(address[]).notice: upgrade vaults instance using transparent proxy with the current implementation

upgradeVaultsAndCall(address[],bytes[]).notice: upgrade vaults instance using transparent proxy with the current implementation and call the instance

vaults(uint256,uint256).notice: get a list of vaults created by this factory
